name: The Treachery
description:
You as a brave rogue, descended down to the hell to save your precious companion from the bottom of the hell. Now you need to ascend through 9 floors of hell to save your belowed companion and yourself.

But hell is not easy, to ascend through each circle, you must defeat the keeper of the circle. Also you must sacrifice a precious part of you or your companion.

Your companion helps you through your journey by healing you constantly.

Be careful of your choices, you will feel the lack of what you sacrificed.
